message: Let's start fair, I'll take the bigger share this time.  We can work out a more even split later.
My turn for a better share. Think carefully, the value decreases quickly for you.
Let's compromise.  I'm willing to give up some, but I need a better share than last time. We have to be smart about how we split the money before it loses all its value!
The clock is ticking, Alice. This offer is fair, and we both lose out if we wait much longer.
